text: Our last will to fight has been snuffed out. Even our fiercest fighters toss down their blades and submit. Our collapse is nigh.
Our fervor rises like an inferno, consuming doubt and kindling the undying spirit of rebellion. In the crucible of defiance, we forge a legacy that shall not be extinguished.
The nascent flames of our passion will spark ever brighter, with each victory.
The screamed panic of the cowardly minions of the Han are but fuel for our fire.
Like an unstoppable wildfire, our momentum blazes ever brighter, ever hotter, ever fiercer. None can douse it. None can resist.
With our indomitable might so clearly untameable, those who stand in our path can either submit, or be burned to cinders.
Chaos is a tool that we use, to invade and pillage these land for their wealth and supplies.
